dcterms:creator: Cyrus Rashtchian
Peter Young
Micah Hodosh
Julia Hockenmaier
dcterms:description: A dataset combining images from Flickr and PASCAL for training multimodal models, where Flickr provides a large number of unlabeled image-caption pairs and PASCAL offers a smaller set of labeled images.
dcterms:title: Flickr-PASCAL

dcterms:creator: Xinlei Chen
Haoqi Fan
Ross B. Girshick
Kaiming He
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, containing images with multiple object categories and five captions per image.
dcterms:title: COCO
